title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building agentic workflows for augmented observability (COP405)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 构建用于增强可观测性的智能体工作流 (COP405)
abstract: Drowning in observability data but starving for insights? In this live, interactive coding session, we'll build an AI agent that transforms raw telemetry into actionable intelligence. We'll build a system that correlates metrics, logs, and traces from Amazon CloudWatch. Our agent will analyze patterns, create relevant monitoring artifacts, and provide natural language explanations of complex issues. We'll show how to productionize the agent to autonomously respond to operational events, creating a proactive observability workflow. Join us to explore the future of AI-augmented observability.
abstract_cn: 淹没在可观测性数据中却渴求洞察？在这场实时互动编码会议中，我们将构建一个AI代理，将原始遥测数据转化为可操作的智能。我们将构建一个系统，关联来自Amazon CloudWatch的指标、日志和追踪。我们的代理将分析模式，创建相关的监控工件，并提供复杂问题的自然语言解释。我们将展示如何将代理产品化，使其自主响应运营事件，创建主动式可观测性工作流。加入我们，探索AI增强可观测性的未来。
